com.hbm.devices.scan - package com.hbm.devices.scan
Provides some common classes useful for implementing the HBM (Hottinger Baldwin Messtechnik GmbH) device scan.

Provides classes to implement the announce part of the HBM (Hottinger Baldwin Messtechnik GmbH) device scan.
